title: Riot is proving it's bias with this Dunkey stuff.
body:
No idea who he was but don't care.

What I do care about is why he got banned: He was being toxic, he deserved it. **However, with that said,** how come this guy gets banned because of toxic behavior on his youtube channel yet Twitch streamers like Kaceytron are still streaming everyday? This is a girl who is the epitome of toxic. She makes a living off making the game hell for her teammates and ruinin countless matches.

Why does this 'Dunkey' person get banned for such an act, yet this girl of ill-repute gets to ruin dozens of matches every week for people, AND gets paid for it, and nothing is done to her?

replies.body:
1. This isn't his first offense
2. Because Kaceytron, from the one game I've seen, isn't trolling. She's really just that bad. Or she's that good at hiding it.
3. Because saying that someone should get gunned down is not acceptable under ANY circumstances.

"I'm gonna zoom all the way in and lock my camera because that's how hardcore pro players do it. *zooms into Syndra's feet, keeps randomly spamming skills* Oops, I thought that was a enemy. Oops, thought that was an enemy. Oh my gosh I can't see like this how do the LCS players play like this?"

She literally did that in a stream I saw of her. 

If I were to pull that crap in a game I would be instantly caught by Lyte's amazing system.

It's not even a case of "maybe she's just a bad player." She is obviously intentionally doing it.
That... still just sounds like she's just being a dumbass. Irritating, but not an offense by any measure.
Dude trolling by definition is being a dumbass in order to piss off people around you lmfao
My point exactly. To troll, you have to do it intentionally. I don't think that she's quite capable of that. Well, not that I care enough about her to really analyze her in depth, but still.

Oh lord your the exact person she is marketing towards.

Good day.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ta8Dt24G8XU

She's trolling dude.
Sky calls her out on it and says that he loves her content because it's pure comedic genius multiple times and she never disputes those comments.
She is trolling on purpose and she isn't getting permabanned for it.

They are proving their bias by deleting dunkey threads, your thread is next.  They don't like that people are calling them out.  You can make it about Dunkey, but all he did was highlight the problems in league.

> [{quoted}](name=xXBlue FalconXx,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Uwp9Uq1r,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-09-13T00:49:00.987+0000)
>
> They are proving their bias by deleting dunkey threads, your thread is next.  They don't like that people are calling them out.  You can make it about Dunkey, but all he did was highlight the problems in league.

There are at least a dozen different threads about it just on the front page of misc...
There are about 10 threads(what I've seen so far) about this. So I don't know what you're talking about.

Yeah all this Dunkey stuff is distracting us from buying PROJECT skins and being hyped for Worlds.

Riot can't have that.

Right!

btw, the riot fanboys up in these threads down voting every comment.  make sure to up vote the posts with common sense.

I agreed, Riot should permaban him for telling someone that they "should be gunned down in the street"

http://www.auplod.com/u/auopld60eff.png

I agree the Malphite should also get banned for intentionally trying to sabotage a game since that seems much more extreme then some random person telling you to die over the internet who has no idea who you are.
No malphite did it once, dunkey harassed people and abused them verbally many games and got chat bans etc

How is it proving it's bias?  You realize that it's an automated, unbiased system, right?  It's is MUCH easier to say someone was being toxic if they have chatlogs with 'I hope you get gunned down in the streets like the degenerate you are' than Kaceytron who could legitimately be that bad (even though she's totally trolling)

Did you look into this at all, Dunkey was banend cuz he got pissed over someone intentionally feeding (he even has video proof of it, idk how much more obvious it can be) and the dude who fed didn't receive ANY punishment, while Dunkey got a 2 week ban. The reason why people are up in arms about this isn't about the "who" or "why" its the "how". Riot is being biased because they refuse to take action on the player who with proof of his feeding receives no punishment. And if you still stand by their report system being fine and riot being unbiased, then I hope to god that troll is in all of your games, because obviously you have blinders over your eyes.

*Edit* I do not support Dunkey's behavior or reaction and i do believe he should take his punishment, im pissed because they arent taking action on these players who are doing something much worse than just "talking trash" when you can press the mute buttong RIGHT NEXT TO someone's summoner name...
Malphite trolled once, dunkey was harassing people and using horrible language for many games and was chat banned many times

> [{quoted}](name=I urgot about it,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Uwp9Uq1r,comment-id=000700000000,timestamp=2015-09-13T18:37:18.116+0000)
>
> Malphite trolled once, dunkey was harassing people and using horrible language for many games and was chat banned many times
i would be pissed to if i had 98 lp and i had someone trolled and fed on purpose, also you dont know what happened in the games before that maybe he had trollers in games before, and i dont think being toxic is a big deal they made a mute button for a reason
Anyways, instead of arguing, we are missing the point of the whole video. Dunkey quit because this wasn't the game he loved, and that's that.
How do you know the Malphite didn't get punished too?

also they aren't "toxic" toxic is someone who is repeatedly rude and harasses other players. she plays the game within rules boundaries if you paid attention. playing bad is not bannable and what is said on twitch is for twitch
Playing bad on purpose is much more toxic than a few words that are easily muted.

> [{quoted}](name=xXBlue FalconXx,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Uwp9Uq1r,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2015-09-13T01:01:52.669+0000)
>
> Playing bad on purpose is much more toxic than a few words that are easily muted.

I agreed, why not ban this 600 games silver 3 piece of trash with an average of 2:1 KDA.
http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=xXBlue+FalconXx+


http://www.auplod.com/u/auopld60eff.png
League isn't about KDA, its about wins.  Guess you missed the 65% win rate in ranked.  Good try though.

> [{quoted}](name=xXBlue FalconXx,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Uwp9Uq1r,comment-id=0002000100000000,timestamp=2015-09-13T01:22:44.108+0000)
>
> League isn't about KDA, its about wins.  Guess you missed the 65% win rate in ranked.  Good try though.

296W 294L (Win Ratio 50%)
lol get good, I didn't know ARAM = Ranked. It took me just 25 games to get a better ranked than your and I barely play Summoner's Rift. Easiest free skin ever.
http://www.lolking.net/summoner/na/22241572#profile

http://www.auplod.com/u/auopld60eff.png

Match average past 20 games is 65%.  I can't change the fact that I sucked in bronze forever while switching from console fps's to 1st timing mouse/ keyboard top-down moba's.  

I see your just gonna keep grasping at straws here, have a good day!
Guys please...let's not argue about rank and winrates and kda's.

Sorry?  What's your point with this statement?  You have left me extremely confused.  You're calling his a piece of trash, highlighting his high KDA, and later he even tells you that KDA doesn't matter...it's just...

What the hell is your point?
That his point is invalid...maybe..

Intentionally playing bad, aka feeding/trolling is a bannable offense.
Anyone who watches 60 seconds of her stream can instantly tell what she's doing. Using the excuse of "Well she technically isn't break the rules" is just piss poor.

That's like a person standing on an overpass "accidentally" dropping things on cars and recording it for entertainment but he doesn't get in trouble because he's not technically breaking the law, because accidentally dropping stuff, that just happens to land on cars, isn't a crime.
She's acting, she has a sub only stream where she puts off her mask and shows her true self

What id like to point out is that he asked for help for being the #1 LOL youtuber (at the time) but they said no in helping him with his ban because it would show favoritism, BUT in multiple instances streamers or youtubers got unbanned with the help of the company Ex: Imaqtpie got help from riot even tho it clearly showed in the gameplay of which he got banned from that he was inting...FUN FACT: he got banned for trash talking someone that was inting GJ Riot

I can't believe dunkey is done with lesgue.
Rip dukey
I will not play league again until dunkey posts another leauge video.
Why? Do you follow his example?

i think riot is being unfair to dunkey, because even though he might be toxic he has used that humor to bring many people into league including myself and i have maybe spent $400 on this game alone. He gets people into league and riot gives him no credit. The thing that made dunkey quit was that he asked riot to unban him so he could finish the video he was making then they could put the ban on for the time he was deserved and riot said no
i played with kaceytron and i have 0 complaints, she was actually a great support
I don't watch either Kaceytron or Dunkey regularly, but if you're talking about Kaceytron just showing herself off, that's Twitch's problem, not Riot's.
They are talking about how she basically trolls her games on stream. I.E. Zooming in on syndra's feet and spamming skills saying its what pros are doing.
Probably because its very hard to prove she is being satire. Riot would probably think she is just really bad.
Keep in mind his ban was only 2 weeks. I think alot of people incorrectly think he was prema'd.

> [{quoted}](name=Ghos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Uwp9Uq1r,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-09-13T00:42:48.072+0000)
>
> Keep in mind his ban was only 2 weeks. I think alot of people incorrectly think he was prema'd.

Whether he was banned for 2 weeks or perma it's ridiculous what this game has become. 

Anyone that plays ranked for more than a year and doesn't become toxic then i commend them. The game now cater to trolls and feeders so much that it's just discouraging to play ranked anymore. They don't get banned while people who say things like "you're shit" get a ban. I don't know how that make sense when you can easily mute a person trash talking if you can't handle it but you can't stop someone from playing shit and troll and feeds every single game. And this is becoming more and more common every game. Trolls and feeders doesn't appear in every once in a while, it's in every single ranked game possible and they still are not banned. I see the same people most of the game and I have reported them tons of time for being a feeder but I still see them playing ranked.
Yeah it makes 0 sense for verbal abuse to be punishable in a game with a mute button, but white knight idealists will stand by it to the end.
No you mute then report
